content: तादृक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (क्षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) तादृश् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} तादृश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (शी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Such-like, like him, her or it, like that; तादृग्गुणा <ls>Ms. 9. 22</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">36</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 46</ls>; यादृशस्तादृशः any body whoever, common or ordinary man; उपदेशो न दातव्यो यादृशे तादृशे जने <ls>Pt. 1. 390.</ls>
